Erdo‘g‘on Al-Bag‘dodiyning bolasi ham qo‘lga olinganini xabar qildi

07 Nov 2019, 20:23

Turkiya prezidenti Rajab Toyyib Erdo‘g‘on xavfsizlik xizmati xodimlari IShID sobiq yetakchisi Abu Bakr al-Bag‘dodiyning farzandini ham qo‘lga tushirganini ma’lum qildi. Bu haqda “TASS” xabar berdi.


Foto: The Frontier Post

“Bola DNK tekshiruvidan o‘tkazildi va uning al-Bag‘dodiyning farzandi ekanligi tasdiqlandi. IShID sobiq yetakchisining qarindoshlari Turkiyadagi deportatsiya markazida bo‘lib turibdi. Adliya vazirligi ularga aloqador ishlar bo‘yicha qonun doirasida kerakli chora-tadbirlarni amalga oshiradi”, — deya ta’kidlagan Erdo‘g‘on. Biroq Turkiya davlat rahbari bolaning jinsi haqida ma’lumot bermagan.
6-noyabr kuni Turkiya prezidenti al-Bag‘dodiyning opasi va uning oila a’zolari hibsga olinganini tasdiqlagan va IShID rahnamosining xotini ham Suriyada qo‘lga tushirilganini e’lon qilgandi.
Mavzuga doir:Tortinchoq bola, ayollarni zo‘rlovchi, birinchi raqamli terrorchi. IShID yetakchisi Abu Bakr al-Bag‘dodiyning hayot yo‘li IShID yetakchisi Abu Bakr al-Bag‘dodiy qanday yo‘q qilindi?
Abu Bakr al-Bag‘dodiy 27-oktabrda Suriyaning Idlib viloyatida AQSh harbiylarining havodan yo‘llagan hujumi natijasida o‘lgan. AQSh prezidenti Donald Tramp Iroq, Suriya, Amerika, Rossiya, Turkiya va kurdlarga operatsiyadagi hamkorlik uchun minnatdorchilik bildirgan va Bag‘dodiyning o‘limi haqidagi ma’lumotni rasman tasdiqlagan. IShID sobiq rahbarining jasadi qoldiqlari dengizga oqizilishi va tashkilot rahbarligini kelib chiqishi turkman millatiga mansub iroqlik sobiq zobit Abdulla Qardosh egallashi taxmin qilingandi. Keyinchalik IShID vakillari ham rahnamo halok bo‘lganligini tasdiqladi va AQShdan qasos olishni va’da berdi. IShID terroristik tashkilotida Bag‘dodiyning o‘rnini Abu Ibrohim al-Hoshimiy al-Qurayshiy egallagan. 4-noyabr, yakshanba kuni Suriyaning Aleppo viloyatida Turkiya harbiylari Bag‘dodiyning opasi 65 yoshli Rasmiya Avad va uning oila a’zolarini qo‘lga olgan. 7-noyabrda AQSh davlat departamenti IShID terrorchilik tashkilotining yetakchisi Abu Bakr al-Bag‘dodiyning o‘rnini egallagan yangi rahnamo ham tez orada yo‘q qilinishini ma’lum qildi.

IShID ekstremistik guruhi jahonning bir qator mamlakatlari va xalqaro tashkilotlar tomonidan “terrorchilik tashkiloti” deb topilgan.

Er-Baghdadi's son has also been arrested

07 Nov 2019, 20:23

Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan has said security forces have seized the son of former ISIS leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi. About it reports TASS.


Photo: The Frontier Post

"The baby was tested for DNA and confirmed that he was a child of al-Baghdadi. Relatives of the former leader of the ISID are at the deportation center in Turkey. The Justice Ministry will take all necessary measures within their jurisdiction, ”Erdogan said. However, the Turkish president did not provide details about the gender of the child.
On November 6, Turkish President al-Baghdadi confirmed the arrest of his sister and family members, and announced that the wife of ISIS leader had been arrested in Syria.
Topic: Shy boy, rapist, number one terrorist. How was the death of Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, the leader of ISIS, the death of Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi?
Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi was killed on October 27 as a result of a US air strike in Syria's Idlib province. US President Donald Trump thanked Iraq, Syria, America, Russia, Turkey and Kurds for their cooperation in the operation, and officially confirmed the death of Baghdadi. It is thought that the remains of the former ISIS leader will be thrown into the sea and the leadership of the organization will be occupied by the former Iraqi Iraqi officer, Abdullah Brother. Later, ISIS representatives confirmed that the leader had been killed and promised to take revenge on the United States. Abu Ibrahim al-Hashimi al-Quraishi was replaced by Baghdadi in the ISIS terrorist organization. On Sunday, November 4, in the Aleppo region of Syria, Turkish troops seized 65-year-old Rasmuss Avad and his family members. On November 7, the US State Department announced that the new leader, who replaced Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, the leader of the ISIS terrorist organization, would be removed soon.

The ISIS extremist group has been recognized by a number of countries and international organizations as a "terrorist organization."
